question:
Which among the following matches of revenue departments during the time of Ranjit Singh with their corresponding account duties is/ are correct?
1. Daftar-i-Mawajib- Accounts of various governmental service
2. Daftar-i-Roznamcha-i-Ikharjat- Accounts of daily expenditures
3. Daftar-i-Taujhihat- Accounts of Royal household
Choose the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Daftar-i-Mawajib was associated with the accounts of various governmental services. Daftar-i-Taujhihat dealt with the accounts of the Royal household. Daftar-i-Roznamcha-i-Ikharjat was associated with the accounts of daily expenditures.
